Articles.Content: I completed a mun survey contract, (I did a crew report within range of the area, and at a low enough altitude) but for some reason, it didn't register. does anyone know which line to change in the save file to force it to complete? I already tried the "state =" line under the PARAM line, but all that did was change the tracking of the contract, it still didn't register completion. I haven't had issues with any other contract so far, I suspect this issue has to do with the mod I have installed that gives me the true altitude above the ground, and not ASL, but I didn't have any issues with any other low altitude mun surveys, but right now, I just want to know which line to change in the save file.
